Create Component Templates

Template for Basic style

Create a new template page by duplicating the template.html and name it template-base-style.html

In this page create samples for each of the commonly used elements: 

<h1> <h2> <h3> <h4> <h5> <h6>
<p> <ol> <ul> <li> <dl> <dt> <dd>

For example (I'm showing them in a grid, but you should show them without):

Headings

Heading 1

Heading 2

Heading 3

Heading 4

Heading 5
Heading 6

Paragraph

Paragraph text

Define the Basic style

Define style for each of the most commonly used elements.

Template for Cards in a Grid

Duplicate the template.html you created last week, name it template-card-grid.html

In this new card, create a grid with 2 columns, 3 columns, 4 columns, 6 columns, 8 columns, 12 columns

Create a card which has square corners, with a header that appears at the top (no overlapping), a footer that appears at the bottom (no overlapping), and content between (use a div for this)

Test your card in your 4 column grid
